page.title: 10VILLAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: {The village policeman}lives in the village. He works an 8 hour day for seven days then has two days off, in a 28 day cycle working 7 days from 8a.m. to 4p.m., 7 days from 6p.m. to 2a.m., 7 days from 10a.m.to 6p.m. and 7 days off duty. He has a{police car}but prefers to spend as much time as possible {patrolling on foot.}He encourages people to become more aware of ways of preventing crime. His time is spent in dealing with {road traffic accidents, damage {reports, theft, burglary, disputes in {families or between neighbours, {searching for missing persons and {dealing with deaths. { He says}"Yes, I do enjoy my work and could not visualise myself in any other profession now."
